DOC.brief_summary: Duchenne muscular dystrophy ( DMD ) , X-linked recessive genetic disease always progress slowly，tends lead proximal skeletal muscle atrophy weakness limb , well impaired respiratory muscle cardiac muscle . To large extent , patient always lose motor function gradually die heart failure severe infection end stage DMD . At present , treatment strategy rely heteropathy accompany rehabilitation training . However , therapeutic effect remain extremely limited . Human umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cell ( hUC-MSCs ) evidence improve motor function , increase muscle strength reduce abnormal level relate enzymes , creatine kinase ( CK ) , lactate dehydrogenase ( LDH ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) . This study aim explore safety efficacy hUC-MSCs transplantation DMD .
